text: Mu y’ukuri bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri n’ugukingira abandi bantu munzira y’Imana, nugukingira abandi kwinjira mungoro y’Imana yaninahajwe ariwo twagize baba ngaho muri ico gisagara hamwe n’ingenzi, n’uwuzo kwipfuza kugira ububisha bwiwe muri iryo sengero muguhemukira umutima wiwe rero tuzomuhonjesha ibihano bibabaza cane
